1.name: Gratin de courgettes
1.summary:
This recipe serves 4 and takes around 30min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Slice zucchini into thin rounds.
Brown ground beef in a skillet.
Layer zucchini and beef in a baking dish, pour cream over the top, sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes until the cheese is golden and bubbly.

11.name: Breakfast muffins
11.summary:
This recipe serves 1 week of breakfast for 1 and takes around 30min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Dans un saladier, battez les oeufs et ajoutez-y l'huile et le lait
Dans un autre récipient, ajoutez la farine de châtaigne, le sucre brun et la levure
Vous pouvez ensuite mélanger les 2 préparations et bien homogénéiser pour un aspect lisse et onctueux
Hachez grossièrement votre chocolat et le mélange de noix (quelques cranberries et graines de lupin seront aussi délicieuses !)
Incorporez à la préparation et laissez reposer au frais pendant une heure
Versez votre pâte dans des moules à muffin beurrés
Enfournez à 180°C pendant 17 minutes (Plantez un couteau, s'il ressort 'sec', le muffin est cuit!)

12.name: Telebreizh crepes (original)
12.summary:
This recipe serves 40 crepes and takes around 2h to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Dans un saladier, battez les oeufs avec le lait et le beurre
Incorporez farine et eau alternativement pour éviter les grumeaux
Faites cuire chaque crêpe jusqu'à ce qu'elle soit presque dorée, "une crêpe cuite est une crêpe trop cuite"

13.name: Telebreizh crepes (sweet edition)
13.summary:
This recipe serves 40 crepes and takes around 2h to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Dans un saladier, battez les oeufs avec le beurre et une partie du lait
Incorporez farine et lait alternativement pour éviter les grumeaux
"Sucre au goût"
Faites cuire chaque crêpe jusqu'à ce qu'elle soit presque dorée, "une crêpe cuite est une crêpe trop cuite"

14.name: Brioche de Micheline (26ème rencontre)
14.summary:
This recipe serves 1 brioche and takes around 2h to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Mélanger la farine,la levure, le sucre et le sel.
Incorporer les œufs, puis le beurre ramolli.
Ajouter du lait tiède et pétrir pour obtenir une pâte souple et non collante. ( au robot 5 min environ )
Mettre en boule, la placer dans un récipient et couvrir d'un torchon.

Laisser monter environ 1 heure à 1 heure 30 (je me sers de mon micro-onde comme d'une étuve en y faisant bouillir un peu d'eau dans un grand saladier pendant le pétrissage de la pâte...quand la pâte est prête je vide l'eau, essuie légèrement et y place le pâton avant de remettre le tout dans le micro-onde éteint ainsi pas de risque de courant d'air et la levée démarre rapidement)
On "rompt" la pâte en appuyant en son milieu.
La travailler de nouveau (y ajouter éventuellement des raisins secs, pépites de chocolat ou des fruits confits).

On peut la natter très facilement pour en faire des brioches vendéennes, 
ou on peut faire des boules de 80 à 100 g que l'on placera par 3 dans des moules à cake.
On peut aussi faire des pains aux raisins (escargots) ou brioche chinois, des briochés à la pomme.
Laisser de nouveau monter dans un endroit chaud et à l'abri des courants d'air jusqu'à ce que la brioche ait de nouveau doublé de volume.
Cuire la brioche nattée 20 min à 180°C (thermostat 6), 30 à 35 min une brioche Nanterre (dans le moule à cake), 15 min les escargots.

2.name: Pasta Carbonara
2.summary:
This recipe serves 2 and takes around 20min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Boil water and cook pasta.
Cook bacon in pan.
Mix pasta with eggs and bacon.

3.name: Chicken Curry
3.summary:
This recipe serves 4 and takes around 40min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Chop onion and garlic.
Sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add chicken pieces and brown on all sides.
Add curry powder and stir well.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes until chicken is cooked through.

4.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
4.summary:
This recipe serves 2 and takes around 15min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger for 1-2 minutes.
Add vegetables and stir-fry on high heat for 8-10 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir for another 1-2 minutes before serving.

5.name: Pancakes
5.summary:
This recipe serves 4 and takes around 20min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Mix flour, sugar, milk, and egg to make a smooth batter.
Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Pour batter into skillet and cook each pancake for 2-3 minutes per side until golden.

6.name: Beef Tacos
6.summary:
This recipe serves 3 and takes around 25min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Warm taco shells in the oven for 5 minutes.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, cheddar, and salsa.

7.name: Margarita Pizza
7.summary:
This recipe serves 4 and takes around 30min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Preheat oven to 220°C.
Roll out pizza dough and place on a baking tray.
Spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella slices, and sprinkle basil on top.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese melted.

8.name: Caesar Salad
8.summary:
This recipe serves 2 and takes around 20min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Grill or pan-fry chicken until fully cooked.
Chop lettuce and place in a large bowl.
Add croutons, Parmesan, Caesar sauce, and sliced chicken. Toss to combine.

9.name: Chocolate Cake
9.summary:
This recipe serves 8 and takes around 60min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Preheat oven to 180°C and grease a cake pan.
Melt chocolate and butter together.
Mix in sugar and eggs until smooth.
Fold in flour and pour batter into pan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.

10.name: Tomato Soup
10.summary:
This recipe serves 4 and takes around 30min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Chop tomatoes, onion, and garlic.
Sauté onion and garlic in a pot until soft.
Add tomatoes and vegetable broth. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend soup until smooth and stir in cream before serving.

0.name: Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs

steps.description: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat until foamy.
Then add bread crumbs, tossing to coat in butter, until toasted and lightly browned.
Remove from pan into small bowl; mix in cheese and about a tablespoon of the green scallion tops.
In the meantime, begin to prepare your pasta according to the directions on the package.
While the pasta is cooking, put about a tablespoon of olive oil in the same pan you used for the bread crumbs.
Over medium heat, add the garlic, whites of the scallions, and cauliflower to the skillet.
Saute until the cauliflower shows some caramelization.
Then add the wine until the florets are tender-crisp.
Add salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
When pasta is just shy of al dente, reserve about a cup of the cooking water and drain the pasta.

Add the drained pasta to the skillet—still over medium heat—with the veggies and toss with some pasta water, as necessary (I added a little at a time; I ended up using about 1/2 cup), till the pasta is coated and turns easily.
You may want to add another little drizzle of olive oil. Again, taste and season accordingly.
Put into serving bowls and top with the bread crumb mixture. Sprinkle some more scallion greens on top.
That's it! There's cauliflower in every bite. And that's a great thing.

0.summary:
This recipe serves 2 and takes around 45min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

15.name: Quiche Lorraine
15.summary:
This recipe serves 4 and takes around 50min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Préchauffez le four à 180°C. Étalez la pâte brisée dans un moule à tarte beurré.
Piquez le fond de tarte avec une fourchette et faites-la cuire à blanc pendant 10 minutes.
Pendant ce temps, coupez les lardons et faites-les revenir dans une poêle jusqu'à ce qu'ils soient dorés.
Dans un bol, battez les œufs avec la crème et le lait. Ajoutez sel, poivre et une pincée de noix de muscade.
Disposez les lardons sur le fond de tarte précuit. Ajoutez le fromage râpé.
Versez la préparation sur les lardons et le fromage.
Enfournez pour 25-30 minutes jusqu'à ce que la quiche soit dorée et gonflée.
Laissez tiédir quelques minutes avant de servir.

16.name: Tarte aux épinards
16.summary:
This recipe serves 4 and takes around 30min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Préchauffez le four à 180°C. Étalez la pâte dans un moule à tarte.
Lavez les épinards et pressez-les pour retirer l'excès d'eau.
Dans un bol, battez les œufs avec la crème. Incorporez les épinards refroidis et la feta émiettée.
Versez le mélange sur la pâte.
Enfournez pour 30-35 minutes jusqu'à ce que la tarte soit bien dorée.

17.name: Gratin dauphinois
17.summary:
This recipe serves 6 and takes around 1h 30min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Préchauffez le four à 160°C. Frottez un plat à gratin avec une gousse d'ail coupée, puis beurrez-le généreusement.
Épluchez les pommes de terre et coupez-les en fines rondelles.
Dans une casserole, faites chauffer la crème et le lait avec l'ail haché, le sel, le poivre et la noix de muscade.
Disposez une première couche de pommes de terre dans le plat. Versez un peu de crème, ajoutez du fromage râpé.
Continuez à alterner couches de pommes de terre, crème et fromage et terminez par du fromage.
Enfournez pour 1h à 1h15 jusqu'à ce que les pommes de terre soient tendres et le dessus bien doré.
Laissez reposer 10 minutes avant de servir.

18.name: Brownies au chocolat
18.summary:
This recipe serves 6 and takes around 40min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line a baking pan with parchment paper.
Melt chocolate and butter together in a double boiler or microwave, stirring until smooth.
Remove from heat and whisk in sugar until well combined.
Add eggs one at a time, whisking well after each addition.
Sift in flour, baking powder, and salt. Gently fold until just combined.
Pour batter into prepared pan and spread evenly.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until edges are set but center is still slightly soft.
Let cool completely in pan before cutting into squares.

19.name: American Apple Pie
19.summary:
This recipe serves 8 and takes around 1h 30min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Make the pastry: Mix flour and salt, then rub in cold butter until it resembles breadcrumbs.
Add cold water gradually and form into a dough. Divide in half, wrap in plastic, and chill for 30 minutes.
Peel and slice apples. Toss with sugar, cinnamon, and lemon juice.
Preheat oven to 200°C. Roll out half the pastry and line a 9-inch pie dish.
Fill with apple mixture. Roll out remaining pastry and place on top. Seal edges and cut vents.
Brush with beaten egg and sprinkle with sugar.
Bake for 45-50 minutes until golden brown and apples are tender.

20.name: Honey Glazed Salmon
20.summary:
This recipe serves 4 and takes around 25min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Mix honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, grated ginger, and lemon juice in a bowl.
Place salmon fillets on the baking sheet, season with salt and pepper.
Brush salmon generously with the honey-soy glaze.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily.
Brush with remaining glaze and serve immediately.

21.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
21.summary:
This recipe serves 4 and takes around 1h to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Marinate in yogurt, curry powder, and salt for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan and cook chicken pieces until browned. Set aside.
In the same pan, melt butter and sauté chopped onion until soft.
Add minced garlic, ginger, cumin, and paprika. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Return chicken to pan, add cream, and simmer for 10 more minutes.
Season to taste and serve with rice or naan bread.

22.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
22.summary:
This recipe makes 24 cookies and takes around 30min to make.
One portion of this dish costs about :

steps.description: Preheat oven to 190°C. Line baking sheets with parchment paper.
Cream softened butter with both sugars until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla extract.
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a separate bowl.
Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto baking sheets, spacing them 2 inches apart.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until edges are golden but centers are still soft.
Cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack.
